mapper.sql: warehouse_id, warehouse_num, warehouse_name, dept_id, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark

select w.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_num, w.warehouse_name, w.status, w.del_flag, w.create_by, w.create_time, w.update_by, w.update_time, w.remark, d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name,d.parent_id,d.dept_type from sys_warehouse w left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = w.dept_id
mapper.select:
w.warehouse_num like concat(concat('%',#{ware.warehouseNum}),'%')
or w.warehouse_name like concat(concat('%',#{ware.warehouseName}),'%')
and w.status=#{ware.status} and w.del_flag = '0'
order by w.create_time desc

select w.warehouse_id, w.warehouse_num, w.warehouse_name, w.status, w.remark, d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name,d.parent_id,d.dept_type from sys_warehouse w left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = w.dept_id where w.warehouse_id=#{warehouseId}

w.warehouse_num like concat(concat('%',#{ware.warehouseNum}),'%')
or w.warehouse_name like concat(concat('%',#{ware.warehouseName}),'%')
and w.status=#{ware.status} and w.del_flag = '0' and warehouse_id not in (select warehouse_id from sys_warehouse_init)
order by w.create_time desc
